item.title: Letâ€™s do a peek inside the admin dashboard - Abuse API endpoint
item.description: There is broken access control in the API which helps an employee to become the admin of a workspace but with limited permissions. Application introduction Itâ€™s a productivity app that has over 2 million+ users and is used by business to track employee project time and expenses. Key Features There are many features, but these are some of the most important ones: User can join multiple workspaces User can create their own workspace The admin of a workspace can invite other user by email How does the application work?
